testcase.classname: System should allow Admin to create a new Account
testcase.name: User should create a description for the new account and it cannot be blank
testcase.system-out: Given logs in user login page as admin......................................passed Given user clicks on My Operations..........................................passed And user clicks on Manage Account...........................................passed And user clicks on Create a new Account.....................................passed And user create a description "MyAccount001"................................passed And user fills the balance box "5500".......................................passed And user selects a valid account type from Account Type Drop-down "CREDIT_CARD".passed And user selects a valid account status type from Account Status Type Drop-down "ACTIVE".passed And user selects a valid employee from Employee Drop-down...................passed And user clicks on the Save button..........................................passed Then verify transaction done................................................passed
